Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the cancellation of a health club contract
Summary: Requires health clubs accept cancellation of a membership within twenty-four hours of receiving notice of the cancellation.
LawCode: Amd ยง624, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the cancellation of a health club contract
